name: NBA Jam 2000
overview: All-new 2-on-2 JAM mode featuring 50 dunks and awesome special effects! Custom 2-on-2 JAM mode courts, including street court. Authentic 5-on-5 simulation mode with actual team play styles like the Jazz Pick-and-Roll. Jaw-dropping ultra high-rez graphics! Unique signature moves like the crossover dribble. Create your own JAM player. All 29 teams and over 300 NBA superstars! Over 800 all-new motion captured moves by the "X-Man" Xavier McDaniel!
